page.title: 16NICK NAMES
page.content: Eyemouth was for many years a close knit community and inter marriage was quite common,resulting in certain surnames being common to many families.Lough,Aitchison,Dougal,Collin and Patterson are still predominant names in the area.Nick-names became the easiest way of distinguishing between people with the same surname.These nick-names stuck to them through youth and middle age and have been passed on to children and grandchildren.Many local married women are still referred to by their maiden name.The christian name of a person was often associated with that of their wife or mother,hence"Betty's James"etc.Christian names such as "Jamesina" and" Davida" are associated with the Disaster when several baby girls were named after deceased fathers.
